name: Great Shot, Kid!
Lore: 'With the destruction of the Death Star, the Rebel Alliance received new-found support throughout the galaxy.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. If Death Star ''blown away'': Whenever you deploy a unique (*) starship to a system location, retrieve 3 Force; Once per during each of your turns you may deploy (for free) a starship from hand or Reserve Deck and reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)',
